page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: Shareshill and district is an area of pleasant undulating farmland,crossed in the North East by the M6 and from North to South by the Staffordshire and Worcestershire canal.The region is populated with two villages,two hamlets and several outlying farms joined by a network of narrow lanes. SHARESHILL : Population 720.P.Office and General Store(E.C.Wed).P.H.The Elms (Restaurant and bar meals). C.of E. St. Mary and St.Luke.Garage:Shareshill Service Station.School:Havergal(C.E). CALF HEATH: Population 300.P.Office and General Store(E.C.Wed).P.H.The Dog and Partridge.The Marina:Restaurant and Bar meals,boat hire and moorings.Calf Heath Methodist Church. GREAT SAREDON: Population 50.Builders Merchants and D.I.Y.Shop. LITTLE SAREDON: Population 30.
